Package jakarta.nosql.document

Interface DocumentCondition

  • public interface DocumentCondition
    An unit condition to run a document collection select
    See Also:
    DocumentCollectionManager.select(DocumentQuery)

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Interface Description
      static interface  DocumentCondition.DocumentConditionProvider
      A provider of DocumentCondition where it will create from two parameters: The first one is Document The second one is the Condition

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      DocumentCondition and​(DocumentCondition condition)
      Creates a new DocumentCondition using the Condition.AND
      static DocumentCondition and​(DocumentCondition... conditions)
      Returns a new DocumentCondition aggregating ,as "AND", all the conditions as just one condition.
      static DocumentCondition between​(Document document)
      Creates a DocumentCondition that has a Condition.BETWEEN, it means a select will scanning to a document collection that is between two values informed on a document name.
      static DocumentCondition between​(String name, Object value)
      an alias method to between(Document) where it will create a Document instance first and then apply te condition.
      static DocumentCondition eq​(Document document)
      Creates a DocumentCondition that has a Condition.EQUALS, it means a select will scanning to a document collection that has the same name and equals value informed in this document.
      static DocumentCondition eq​(String name, Object value)
      an alias method to eq(Document) where it will create a Document instance first and then apply te condition.

      • eq

        static DocumentCondition eq​(Document document)
        Creates a DocumentCondition that has a Condition.EQUALS, it means a select will scanning to a document collection that has the same name and equals value informed in this document.
        Parameters:
        document - a column instance
        Returns:
        a DocumentCondition with Condition.EQUALS
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - when column is null

      • eq

        static DocumentCondition eq​(String name,
                            Object value)
        an alias method to eq(Document) where it will create a Document instance first and then apply te condition.
        Parameters:
        name - the name of the document
        value - the document information
        Returns:
        a DocumentCondition with Condition.EQUALS
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - when either name or value is null

      • between

        static DocumentCondition between​(Document document)
        Creates a DocumentCondition that has a Condition.BETWEEN, it means a select will scanning to a document collection that is between two values informed on a document name. The document must have a Document.get() an Iterable implementation with just two elements.
        Parameters:
        document - a column instance
        Returns:
        The between condition
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - when document is null
        IllegalArgumentException - When the document neither has an Iterable instance or two elements on an Iterable.

      • between

        static DocumentCondition between​(String name,
                                 Object value)
        an alias method to between(Document) where it will create a Document instance first and then apply te condition.
        Parameters:
        name - the name of the document
        value - the document information
        Returns:
        a DocumentCondition with Condition.BETWEEN
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - when either name or value is null

      • and

        static DocumentCondition and​(DocumentCondition... conditions)
        Returns a new DocumentCondition aggregating ,as "AND", all the conditions as just one condition. The Document will storage the Condition.getNameField() as key and the value gonna be the List of all conditions, in other words.

        Given:

         
 Document age = Document.of("age", 26);
 Document name = Document.of("name", "otavio");
 DocumentCondition condition = DocumentCondition.eq(name).and(DocumentCondition.gte(age));
        The getDocument() will have "_AND" as key and the list of condition as value.
        Parameters:
        conditions - the conditions to be aggregated
        Returns:
        the new DocumentCondition instance
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - when the conditions is null

      • or

        static DocumentCondition or​(DocumentCondition... conditions)
        Returns a new DocumentCondition aggregating ,as "OR", all the conditions as just one condition. The Document will storage the Condition.getNameField() as key and the value gonna be the List of all conditions, in other words.

        Given:

         
 Document age = Document.of("age", 26);
 Document name = Document.of("name", "otavio");
 ColumnCondition condition = DocumentCondition.eq(name).or(DocumentCondition.gte(age));
        The getDocument() will have "_OR" as key and the list of condition as value.
        Parameters:
        conditions - the conditions to be aggregated
        Returns:
        the new DocumentCondition instance
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - when the condition is null
